about_the_game:
This is Not 60FPS fighting game !
There are a lot of Trash Systems in usual Fighting Game in the world.
Do you like keep watching the decreasing health bar without knowing what's going on?
Do you like to practice too long and too difficult combos and Mix Ups?
Do you like being forced to play unfairly?
if Not, welcome to Straight Battler VI !
Straight Battler VI needs Only deep mind game lovers !

Use only 8 keys, And break your rival !
Q,W,and E are Jump Attack Keys !
A and D is keys of move !
S is Guard, Z and X are Attack ! very simple !

In Straight Battler VI, very simple operations make exciting games !
And we prepared several mode to play !

In Tutorial mode, you can learn how to fight !
In CPU mode, CPU is waiting for you to battle !
In Offline mode, you can compete with your friend in local !
In Online mode, there are Room Match and Rank Match.
In Room Match, you can create and join online room to play with your friend !
In Rank Match, games give you Points if you win !
Go Rank Match and compete for Points with players in around the world !

name: Straight Battler VI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This is Not 60FPS fighting game !Straight Battler VI is very simple battle game !Anyone can learn how to fight in almost one minute and enjoy playing mind game !
